channel.title: python on Roomy
channel.description: Recent content in python on Roomy

item.title: To set virtual python environment with mongoDB
item.description: Step 1. Install python and mongoDB I am using homebrew. So it can be possible to use brew command. Oh, and macOS actually has a python(2.x), but I need 3.x version so I installed it. 맥에는 파이썬 2.x 버전으로 이미 설치되어 있지만, 나는 3.x버전이 필요해서 따로
